actions.name: Terra Domina

cost.trigger: The user attacks a Burrowing creature, or is Burrowing.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user attacks a Burrowing creature, or is Burrowing.

Effect: The user's attacks have their Power increased by 50%, and the user takes 20% less damage from Physical- and Special-Category attacks.

system.description:
Trigger: The user attacks a Burrowing creature, or is Burrowing.

Effect: The user's attacks have their Power increased by 50%, and the user takes 20% less damage from Physical- and Special-Category attacks.
